pon  review  of  the  materials  before  us,  it  is  clear  that  the  identity  card  numbers  and
photographs of the individuals in question were obtained from the Police when handing them
over.  Not  only  have  the  police  failed  to  conduct  an  investigation  into  the  matter,  but  they
have  also  neglected  to  present  the  suspected  individuals  before  a  Magistrate  as  required  by
law. Instead, the police have simply transferred the custody of these individuals to the Army,
citing their status as Army officers, without any further legal process or even an investigation.
